AEO.2014.name: Annual Energy Outlook 2014
AEO.2014.title: Annual Energy Outlook 2014
AEO.2014.description: The Annual Energy Outlook (AEO) from EIA.gov provides long term forecasts (25 years) of U.S. energy production, consumption, and trade for the United Stated of electricity, petroleum, natural gas, coal, nuclear, and renewable sources.
AEO.2014.keyword: Annual Energy Outlook AEO EIA Energy Information Administration long term forecast projection united states production consumption trade electricity petroleum natural gas coal nuclear renewable hydroelectric wind solar
AEO.2014.accessLevelComment: series copyright field contains further information
AEO.2014.format: XML and JSON data API, JSON download file
